channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Santander shares jump 7% after lender announces record quarterly profit, 10-billion-euro buyback
item.description: “We have announced record results for the third consecutive year as we continue to grow revenue, profitability and returns," Executive Chair Ana Botin...

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares rise on fourth-quarter profit beat, Wegovy sales jump
item.description: Danish pharmaceutical behemoth Novo Nordisk reported better-than-expected net profit in the fourth quarter, amid soaring demand for its Wegovy obesity...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Uber beats fourth-quarter revenue expectations but offers soft guidance
item.description: Uber's mobility segment reported $6.91 billion in revenue, up 25% from a year earlier. StreetAccount analysts were expecting $6.77 billion.

item.title: Disney tops quarterly profit estimates, but starts to lose Disney+ streaming subscribers
item.description: The company's streaming business reported another quarter of profitability despite a 1% decline in subscribers for Disney+.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: TotalEnergies posts 21% drop in annual profit, targets buybacks of $2 billion per quarter in 2025
item.description: French oil major TotalEnergies on Wednesday reported a sharp drop in full-year earnings, against a backdrop of lower crude prices and weak fuel demand...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
